dataList.name: Nightmare of La Manchaland
dataList.desc:
If there are La Manchaland Bloodfiends among the enemies, gain the following effects:
- In a Clash against La Manchaland Bloodfiends, lose 4 Clash Power
- When attacking La Manchaland Bloodfiends, lose 5 SP (once per Skill; 2 times per turn)
- Deal -20% Skill damage against La Manchaland Bloodfiends

dataList.name: Stored Blood
dataList.desc:
At Turn End, depending on the [KeptBlood] Stack on self:
- Inflict +2 [Laceration] and +1 [Laceration] Count on self for every Stack
- At 5 or fewer Stack: gain 1 [Binding], 1 [Vulnerable], 1 [AttackDown] and lose 5 SP next turn for every (6 - Stack) (this effect cannot reduce this unit's SP below -20)
- At more than 5 Stack: gain 1 [AttackUp], 1 [DefenseUp], and heal 8 SP next turn for every (Stack - 5) (this effect cannot increase this unit's SP higher than 30)

dataList.name: Sanguivore - Coagulation
dataList.desc:
Upon entry, heal 30 SP
Turn Start: if this unit has [Laceration],
- Gain 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [DefenseUp] for every 5 [Laceration] (max 5)
- Gain 1 [ParryingResultUp] for every 10 [Laceration] (max 2)
Take -50% [Laceration] damage (rounded down)

dataList.name: Prosthesis Model - L37
dataList.desc:
Upon entry, heal 20 SP
Turn Start: For every 1 [Charge] Count, heal 1 SP (max 15)
Turn Start: At less than 5 [Charge] Count, inflict 1 [Reduction] on self
Turn Start: At 5+ [Charge] Count, gain 2 [ParryingResultUp]
Turn Start: At 10+ [Charge] Count, gain 1 [PlusCoinValueUp]
Turn Start: At 15+ [Charge] Count, deal +([Charge] Count on self x 2)% damage with Base Attack Skills
